text: Frank DeMarco (born December 14, 1950) is a Canadian former professional ice hockey player. DeMarco played 179 regular season games and 21 playoff games in International Hockey League (IHL) with the Des Moines Capitols and the Flint Generals. He was awarded the 1973–74 Gary F. Longman Memorial Trophy as the IHL Rookie of the Year.https://www.newspapers.com/newspage/47179763/ ==Awards and honours== {| class="wikitable" ! Award ! Year ! |- | Gary F.
